summary: Implements a Home Assistant media player platform that connects to a Monoprice Blackbird 4K 8x8 HDBaseT matrix, exposing each matrix zone as a controllable media player entity with power and source selection capabilities and providing services to configure all zones at once.
business_intent: Allow users to integrate and automate the Blackbird matrix within Home Assistant, enabling remote control of video inputs and zone power states through the Home Assistant UI, scripts, and automations.
